author: Raysa Straal
description: Raysa's inspiration: "Envious is inspired by today's society. Every single person in this world is envious; people we look up to and admire are all envious of something. I want people to think of envy in a positive manner. It is not a negative feeling; it is what pushes us to be a better version of ourselves! Envy me.....envy you... Envious."
name: Envious
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
